name: Skills
description: The Skills module provides functionality for managing player skills, experience points, and progression.

clientFunctions.name: GetSkillLevel
clientFunctions.description: Retrieve the current level of a specific skill for the local player.

parameters.name: skillName
parameters.description: The name of the skill to check

returns.description: The current level of the specified skill

clientFunctions.example:
local Bridge = exports['community_bridge']:Bridge()

local fishingLevel = Bridge.Skills.GetSkillLevel('fishing')
print("Current fishing level: " .. fishingLevel)

clientFunctions.name: GetResourceName
clientFunctions.description: Gets the name of the skills resource being used.

returns.description: The name of the skills resource

clientFunctions.example:
local Bridge = exports['community_bridge']:Bridge()

local skillsResource = Bridge.Skills.GetResourceName()
print("Using skills resource: " .. skillsResource)

serverFunctions.name: AddXp
serverFunctions.description: Add experience points to a player's skill.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The server ID of the player

parameters.name: skillName
parameters.description: The name of the skill to add XP to

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount of XP to add

serverFunctions.example:
local Bridge = exports['community_bridge']:Bridge()

-- Add 100 XP to a player's fishing skill
local success = Bridge.Skills.AddXp(source, 'fishing', 100)
if success then
    print('Added 100 XP to fishing skill')
end

serverFunctions.name: RemoveXp
serverFunctions.description: Remove experience points from a player's skill.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The server ID of the player

parameters.name: skillName
parameters.description: The name of the skill to remove XP from

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The amount of XP to remove

serverFunctions.example:
local Bridge = exports['community_bridge']:Bridge()

-- Remove 50 XP from a player's fishing skill
local success = Bridge.Skills.RemoveXp(source, 'fishing', 50)
if success then
    print('Removed 50 XP from fishing skill')
end
